items.sentence: Do you think both Tom and Mary have put on weight?
I don\'t think we\'re going to be able to do that.
The police blamed the accident on the taxi driver.
Tom and Mary met through an online dating website.
I didn\'t even consider what Tom might want to do.
I didn\'t figure on something like this happening.
I didn\'t know Tom and you used to work with Mary.
I didn\'t know Tom could speak French so fluently.
You should\'ve heard Tom sing. He was really good.
Tom promised Mary that he wouldn\'t do that again.
